data.text: You look a little worse for wear. Are you all right?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This guy is used to combat.

data.text: Pain in the ass when you're surrounded...

data.text: You're up against one man! Don't be afraid.

data.text: Your sword won't reach. You just sit there and watch.

data.text: It's a piece of cake for me!

data.text: You better get a clear shot.

data.text: Their offensive and defensive capabilities are off the charts. If you underestimate it, you'll die.

data.text: Magic should work. We find an opening and we take it.

data.text: We'll make another opening. Let's go again.

data.text: Barret, I'll do it in five seconds.

data.text: I see what you mean! It's definitely working.

data.text: You don't have to believe me. Just do it!

data.text: Hey, don't you know how to use that? Thunder...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I know, I know... it's magic. Just gimme a sec.

data.text: There's no opening... The technology is impressive.

data.text: I'm in this for the Planet.

data.text: It moves pretty quick for a big guy.

data.text: You gonna run away with your tail between your legs?

data.text: It isn't just gonna let you go...

data.text: A barrier. I've never seen a defense system like this before.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Well then, you do something about it.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Don't get too close and blow yourself up...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Not from the front, I guess.

data.text: There must be some holes in the system.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Well, you better find me something fast.

data.text: Found it. There's a gap in the barrier.

data.text: You knew, didn't you? You've got to be kidding me.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Right here. I'll take the back.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I'm looking forward to seeing you in action, SOLDIER.

data.text: Is it better to strike from a distance?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: The front is not in our favor.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: There has to be a way through...

data.text: Hey, you can't keep going like this and beat that thing.

data.text: Before you start yammering, shoot more!

data.text: You're the one who's been slacking off!

data.text: I wouldn't call something a weapon if it could be easily destroyed.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Whose side are you on, man?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I guess this doesn't work either...
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: It's no use shooting it now.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Shit. Can't you do something about that barrier?

data.text: All right, here's where we fight back.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Let's go, let's go, let's go!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Let's fight back and get this over with!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Look for an opening to cut into.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Always just getting in my way.

data.text: I'm going for it, man! Aim and shoot.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'm gonna shoot you over and over again.

data.text: Hey, this is no time for games!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You're too far out. Take this seriously.

data.text: Watch out for the scorpion's tail! Laser incoming!

data.text: What am I supposed to do?

data.text: A direct hit would be crippling. Take cover behind the steel frame.

data.text: Then get your ass out of sight!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You want some of that? Suit yourself.

data.text: Shut the hell up and hide!

data.text: If you know what you're doing, then move!

data.text: Machines are persistent. They don't get bored.

data.text: I'm persistent. I'm a pain the ass! You know what I'm saying?

data.text: It's the most dangerous when you're getting complacent.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Here we go again. Do you do anything else?

data.text: It's just going along with its programming.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: We're taking our chance the moment after its attack.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Come on, let's go for it!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Don't pass it up! This is our chance!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: We got an opening! I'm gonna start shooting!

data.text: Get the attack pattern in your head.

data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: What the hell? Still hanging on?

data.text: Where the hell are you going?

data.text: If you want to run away, you're on your own.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Self-repair function... Hurry--we'll get it done before it recovers.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: When it shows an opening, that's your chance. We'll hold out till then.

data.text: It's down. We'll take this opportunity to attack.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Let's smash it in. Don't hold back.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You, too. Don't be lazy and don't screw it up.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: When the moment's right, I'm gonna hit it hard and fast! You better be ready for it!

data.text: We don't have time to waste. We'll go at the same time.

data.text: Hey, you ready for this? I'm ready to kick its ass.

data.text: Enough. Time to put an end to this.

data.text: I'm not gonna give up now.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: NWe're gonna make it through this.

data.text: You've come this far and now you're leaving?

data.text: I got your leg! You ain't moving for a minute.

data.text: Broke another one. You're full of holes, ain't you?

data.text: Oh shit, it's trying to get me!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You're a pain in my ass...
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Looks like the scorpion likes you.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Hey! Do you have something to say to me?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You know, it's not much to ask for help from a regular guy.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'm sorry I couldn't make it in time.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: What the hell are you doing?
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: It must be tough, to pick you up.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: You want to help now? You lost?

data.text: If you'd have helped me, I could've moved a lot quicker.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: If you're so worried about me, help me!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: What's the matter, you're freaking out?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This damage is too much to ignore.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: I'll see what I can do to get back on track.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: We can't go on like this. Let's hurry up and get you back on your feet.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Oh, come on! I'm on my own?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: This is what a SOLDIER looks like?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Don't take a damn break. Come on!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Once I'm back on my feet, I'm good to go.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: You think you can do whatever you want, you son of a bitch! Yeah, that hurts, right?
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: It's just a scrape! I don't care!
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'm not gonna let this damn scorpion kill me.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Oh man, need to recover soon.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: I'm feeling a little woozy. Need to get better while I still can.
data.speaker: Barret

data.text: Just a little less of a drag.
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey, I'm gonna leave you here!
data.speaker: Cloud

data.text: Hey, where's the rest of your story? Guess you got blown up and forgot.

data.text: Get your ass in gear! You're a SOLDIER, right?

data.text: Where's the rest of the story?

data.text: We're still looking into it, so please give us a little time.

data.text: Mako is the "blood" of this Planet.

data.text: When you're eating, when you're sleeping.

data.text: Do you even know what mako is?

data.text: Just like the bright red blood that flows through our bodies.

data.text: Can't you hear the Planet screaming...

data.text: You worry more about yourself in the next five seconds than the future of the Planet.

data.text: Your screaming is creeping me out.

data.text: If I see any funny behavior...
